page.title: 03Life Styles (Brownhill)
page.content: The area we are covering is mainly residential and many of the people living in{Brownhill}commute to Leeds or Bradford every day. A survey into the commuting patterns of 100 Brownhill families revealed that of those commuting to work 12% travel<5 miles,54% travel 10 miles;45% travel >10 miles. The housing comprises a mixture of different kinds of dwellings as opposed to the uniformity of many other estates and urban areas. Detached and bungalows,semi-detached terraces and some blocks of flats are all represented in no particular pattern. The majority of these are privately owned but there is some council property interspersed amongst them. Some of the bungalows and also flats are old peoples dwellings with a warden Mrs Kirbyson living in Thornfield Mount to oversee them.It is
